'''Radiant Spincrystal 75''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Varuna's Mercy]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in an [[Aranara]] house in [[Apam Woods]], just east of the western Teleport Waypoint.
